movie.title: General Idi Amin Dada: A Self Portrait
movie.title_english: General Idi Amin Dada: A Self Portrait
movie.title_long: General Idi Amin Dada: A Self Portrait (1974)
movie.description_intro: Idi Amin Dada: A Self Portrait is an extended character study of its subject. It follows Amin closely in a series of formal and informal settings, combined with several short interviews in which Amin expounds his unconventional theories of politics, economics, and international relations. Amin is seen supervising the Ugandan paratrooper school, boating through a wildlife park, playing the accordion in a jazz band at a formal dinner, and staging a mock assault on a small hill representing the Golan Heights. He discusses his plans for an attack on Israel, and his letter to Kurt Waldheim, then Secretary General of the United Nations sent in response to the 1972 Munich massacre, which commended Hitler, is touched upon. On a TV program, it is announced Amin is in possession of a 'manual' which details Israel's plans: The Protocols of the Elders of Zion.
movie.description_full: Idi Amin Dada: A Self Portrait is an extended character study of its subject. It follows Amin closely in a series of formal and informal settings, combined with several short interviews in which Amin expounds his unconventional theories of politics, economics, and international relations. Amin is seen supervising the Ugandan paratrooper school, boating through a wildlife park, playing the accordion in a jazz band at a formal dinner, and staging a mock assault on a small hill representing the Golan Heights. He discusses his plans for an attack on Israel, and his letter to Kurt Waldheim, then Secretary General of the United Nations sent in response to the 1972 Munich massacre, which commended Hitler, is touched upon. On a TV program, it is announced Amin is in possession of a 'manual' which details Israel's plans: The Protocols of the Elders of Zion.

movies.title: Classic Albums Phil Collins: Face Value
movies.title_english: Classic Albums Phil Collins: Face Value
movies.title_long: Classic Albums Phil Collins: Face Value (1999)
movies.summary: A documentary examining the production of the album which turned Phil Collins into a solo star in 1981, spawning several heart-rending songs influenced both by his marital breakdown and love of soul music, as well as the huge hit single "In the Air Tonight".
movies.description_full: A documentary examining the production of the album which turned Phil Collins into a solo star in 1981, spawning several heart-rending songs influenced both by his marital breakdown and love of soul music, as well as the huge hit single "In the Air Tonight".

movies.title: John Was Trying to Contact Aliens
movies.title_english: John Was Trying to Contact Aliens
movies.title_long: John Was Trying to Contact Aliens (2020)
movies.summary: John Shepherd spent 30 years trying to contact extraterrestrials by broadcasting music millions of miles into space. After giving up the search he makes a different connection here on Earth.
movies.description_full: John Shepherd spent 30 years trying to contact extraterrestrials by broadcasting music millions of miles into space. After giving up the search he makes a different connection here on Earth.
movies.synopsis: John Shepherd spent 30 years trying to contact extraterrestrials by broadcasting music millions of miles into space. After giving up the search he makes a different connection here on Earth.

movies.title: Muscle Shoals
movies.summary: Located alongside the Tennessee River, Muscle Shoals, Alabama is the unlikely breeding ground for some of America's most creative and defiant music. Under the spiritual influence of the 'Singing River' as Native Americans called it, the music of Muscle Shoals changed the world and sold millions upon millions of copies. At its heart is Rick Hall who founded FAME Studios. Overcoming crushing poverty and staggering tragedies, he brought black and white together in Alabama's cauldron of racial hostility to create music for the generations while giving birth to the 'Muscle Shoals Sound' and 'The Swampers'. Mick Jagger, Keith Richards, Percy Sledge, Gregg Allman, Clarence Carter, Etta James, Alicia Keys, Bono, and others bear witness to Muscle Shoals' magnetism, mystery, and why it remains influential today.

movies.title: For Love or Money? A Poker Documentary
movies.title_english: For Love or Money? A Poker Documentary
movies.title_long: For Love or Money? A Poker Documentary (2019)
movies.summary: An inside look as two professional poker players, Chris Leong and Stanley Lee, attempt to win poker's most coveted prize... a World Series of Poker bracelet. Appearances include players such as Michael Rocco, Tommy Angelo, 2017 WPT World Champion Asher Conniff, and 2017 WSOP Main Event Champion Scott Blumstein.
movies.description_full: An inside look as two professional poker players, Chris Leong and Stanley Lee, attempt to win poker's most coveted prize... a World Series of Poker bracelet. Appearances include players such as Michael Rocco, Tommy Angelo, 2017 WPT World Champion Asher Conniff, and 2017 WSOP Main Event Champion Scott Blumstein.
